statements: UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customers SET total_purchases = 500.75, membership_level = 'Gold' WHERE email = 'jane.smith@example.com';
UPDATE customers SET total_purchases = total_purchases + 100.50, membership_level = 'Gold' WHERE customer_id = 'f5e06c60-ec76-4e65-9e8d-e1c48098072b';
UPDATE customers SET total_purchases = total_purchases - 50.25, age = age + 1, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE membership_level = 'Silver' AND age >= 30;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', buying_behavior = 'Impulsive' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE loyalty_programs SET program_discount = 15.75, program_name = 'Gold Program' WHERE program_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET buying_behavior = 'Impulsive' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE loyalty_programs SET program_discount = 20.5 WHERE program_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET loyalty_points = 100 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 50.99 WHERE purchase_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET loyalty_points = loyalty_points + 10 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = total_amount * 0.9, purchase_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 1500.50, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 'a123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '555-555-5555' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 150.50, purchase_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE purchase_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET buying_behavior = 'Impulsive' WHERE customer_id = 101;
